Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Financial Pipeline - Phase 1 & 2 improvements \(2025-12-27\)

Phase 1: Quality & Accuracy Fixes
- Fixed valuation scoring \(0 â†’ 100/100\)
- Fixed valuation comparison table \(all 3 methods displayed\)
- Improved document detection \(multi-pattern recognition\)
- Added "liasse_fiscale" document type
- Increased maxOutputTokens \(8192 â†’ 16384\)
- Enhanced Gemini Vision extraction prompts
- Real estate scoring considers user negotiations \(+10 bonus\)

Phase 2: Report Quality & User Experience
- Timestamp at beginning of filename \(YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS_\)
- User comments full integration \(frontend â†’ backend â†’ report\)
- Budget travaux displayed as additional investment cost
- Patrimoniale method always visible with note if missing
- Default message for empty "Points Forts" list

Files changed: 18 files, +1864/-182 lines
- 3 documentation files \(CLAUDE.md, FINANCIAL_PIPELINE.md, CHANGELOG\)
- 10 financial pipeline tools/agents
- 2 frontend components
- 1 backend API endpoint

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add ComptaPreprocessingAgent for COMPTA document preprocessing

New agent that runs BEFORE DocumentExtractionAgent in the Financial Pipeline:

Features:
- Analyzes COMPTA documents with Gemini Vision \(1 request per document\)
- Extracts only relevant pages \(Bilan Actif, Bilan Passif, CR, SIG\)
- Creates consolidated PDFs per fiscal year \(COMPTA2021.pdf, etc.\)
- Saves to data/documents/{SIREN}/A_ANALYSER/
- Caches results - skips preprocessing if A_ANALYSER already exists

Key implementation details:
- Uses SIREN \(9 digits\) instead of SIRET for folder path
- Extracts year from filename \(priority\) with Gemini fallback
- Handles compte_resultat on 2 consecutive pages
- Single "all-in-one" tool \(preprocessComptaDocumentsTool\) for deterministic execution

Files:
- agents/ComptaPreprocessingAgent.ts \(new\)
- tools/preprocessing/* \(10 new tools\)
- Updated FinancialOrchestrator to include new agent
- Updated documentation

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(timeout 3 bash -c "while ! netstat -ano | grep :5176 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ''Server started''")
